description: JSON Schema for flood_storm_information class in Elephant Lexicon

community_id.description: The FEMA community identifier code for the jurisdiction where the property is located.

effective_date.description: The date when the current flood map version became effective. Format: MM/DD/YYYY or YYYY-MM-DD.

evacuation_zone.description: The evacuation zone designation (e.g., A, B, C) assigned to the property location for emergency planning purposes.

fema_search_url.description: The FEMA Map Service Center URL used to search and verify flood information for the specific property address.

flood_insurance_required.description: Indicates whether flood insurance is required based on the flood zone designation and federal regulations.

flood_zone.description: The FEMA flood zone designation indicating the level of flood risk (e.g., AE, X, VE).

map_version.description: The version identifier of the FEMA flood map panel.

panel_number.description: The FEMA flood insurance rate map (FIRM) panel number that contains the property location.

request_identifier.description: Identifier value that should be substituted into the source HTTP request to retrieve this specific data.

source_http_request.description: HTTP request configuration for retrieving this data.

body.description: The body of the request, which may contain JSON or other data formats.

content-type.description: Content-Type header for the request, indicating the media type of the resource.

url.description: The URL endpoint for the request.

title: flood_storm_information
